Property List Key# IOPathMatch

macOS 10.0+## [ Details ](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/iopathmatch#details)

 Type string## [See Also](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/iopathmatch#see-also)

### [Advanced Match Criteria](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/iopathmatch#Advanced-Match-Criteria)

[`IOPropertyMatch`](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/iopropertymatch)The device-specific keys the system must match in order to use your driver.[`IONameMatch`](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/ionamematch)One or more strings that contain the names of possible provider objects in the system registry.[`IOResourceMatch`](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/ioresourcematch)One or more system-specific or device-specific resources that your driver requires.[`IOParentMatch`](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/ioparentmatch)[`IOMatchCategory`](/documentation/bundleresources/information-property-list/iomatchcategory)
